mapper.sql: id, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime, name, cnname, password, address, telephone, email, beginDate, endDate, groupId, accessFileLevel, status, commendMan, movetelePhone, nowAddress, nowtelePhone, identityCode, insuranceCode, instancyLinkman, instancytelePhone, sex, birthday, personnelType, duty, workDate, highSchool, finishSchool, finishSchoolDate, consortName, youngoneName, officetelePhone, consorttelePhone, consortCompany
remark, avocation, strongSuit, commUniCate, bringup, organise, analyse, planing, empolder, relation
mapper.select: select distinct u.id, creator, createTime, updater, updateTime, u.name, cnname, password, address, telephone, email, beginDate, endDate, u.groupId, accessFileLevel, status, commendMan, movetelePhone, nowAddress, nowtelePhone, identityCode, insuranceCode, instancyLinkman, instancytelePhone, sex, birthday, personnelType, duty, workDate, highSchool, finishSchool, finishSchoolDate, consortName, youngoneName, officetelePhone, consorttelePhone, consortCompany , u.remark, avocation, strongSuit, commUniCate, bringup, organise, analyse, planing, empolder, relation ,r.*,groupName,g.remark groupRemark from sys_user_role ur INNER JOIN sys_role r ON ur.roleId=r.roleId INNER JOIN sys_user u ON ur.userId=u.id INNER JOIN sys_group g ON u.groupId=g.groupId where u.name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
